title: Ok Which champion deserve the victorious skins this years?
body:
Remember it has to be a champion that impact both Ranked and LCS.

I think its gonna be either Victorious Leblanc, Zed, Sejuani or Graves.

replies.body: victorious urgot!

> [{quoted}](name=Disturbing,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UVETd4ht,comment-id=00090002,timestamp=2015-03-30T22:30:01.522+0000)
>
> victorious                                {{champion:127}}

if they promise unmasked victorious liss with fluffy ears i promise i begin to play ranked and try to get it
oh my fucking god please give me this Kreygasm

> [{quoted}](name=bad arcade kitty,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UVETd4ht,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-03-30T14:16:55.320+0000)
>
> victorious urgot!

Urgot was indeed seen in the LCS, and performed quite well...

If that's not a victory, I don't know what is
Yes Urgot!

{{champion:6}} {{champion:111}} 
They made the last two weeks so entertaining.

> [{quoted}](name=taleofsonata,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UVETd4ht,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-30T13:23:24.084+0000)
>
> Remember it has to be a champion that impact both Ranked and LCS.
> 
> I think its gonna be either Victorious Leblanc, Zed, Sejuani or Graves.

zed has been spammed in ranked like 3 seasons in a row now
and Lee Sin, though probably not as much (gotta double-check...)

By the way Riot did chose the victorious skins in the past... all except Jarvan were bad choices. 
Jarvan - Tank, Jungler & Bruiser.
Janna - Support & Mage
Elise - Jungler & Mage
Morgana - Support & Mage

I wouldn't be surprised if Lulu gets a victorious skin...
Lulu - Support & Mage
That isn't how they choose, they choose based on which champion had the highest overall impact on the season that doesn't have a victorious skin yet.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UVETd4ht,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-03-30T14:30:17.229+0000)
>
> That isn't how they choose, they choose based on which champion had the highest overall impact on the season that doesn't have a victorious skin yet.

You don't know a joke if you see it yourself.

"Highest overall impact" - Last three Victorious Champions were Mages. Mages are automatically impactful. Sure.

Not really. 
J4 was *the* jungle champion of s1
Janna basically owned s2
Elise dominated the jungle up until her nerfs last season.
Morgana basically defined who could and couldn't win bot lane by countering Thresh.

Also, look at the Championship skins, which are the same exact premise, except that you buy them instead of receiving them as an award: Riven, Thresh, and Shyvana. Those three completely and utterly dominated their role in the season that they got their Championship skin (though Shyvana fell out of favor by the end of s4). It has nothing to do with the fact that they are mages and I never once said that being a mage automatically makes them very impactful.
Were you even around in any of the past seasons of League to understand each Victorious champ's impact to the game?

We're only halfway through the season (if even) so I don't think we can say for sure. So far though, I'd probably say Sion, Leblanc, Vi, Nidalee, Urgot (simply because he finally is making an appearance), or Graves. Rumble, Maokai or Lissandra could also be good choices.
By those rules, it should be Urgod. He is the most notable pick in all of the LCS this year and has impacted ranked immensely (thousands of LCS sheep thinking he's OP)
Sejuani was at the head of the tank meta shift, so she's my first bet.
I really hope it's {{champion:6}}. Ya know just so people are like, wait... what?
I need my Victorious Viktor
rek'sai, she's been nerfed every patch so it would make sense.
{{champion:6}} the champ that defeated TSM
Rengar
I agree with that exept Victorious Rengar would be quite a repetitive name ðŸ˜œ

Sejuani would be cool, but I think Lissandra would also be an option. She had such a heavy impact early in the season, and had SUCH a high win rate for so long in the LCS this season.

Also Victorious Lissandra would look AWESOME

+1 For Victorious Sejuani.

EDIT: Victorious Viktor? Viktorious?
{{champion:83}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:111}}
Its time for an ADC to get a Victorious skin. Victorious Quinn maybe?
What about Ezreal? Aside from having quite a few skins already, he is reasonably popular just about everywhere
I am hoping for Sejuani she had always been a really solid champ and when played right is unstoppable.
Graves, don't recall there being a Victorious ADC yet. Also, I swear i know you....
It's going to be Lissandra

Well currently we have

J4 (Jung/top)
Elise (Jung/top)
Morg (mid)
Janna (sup)

So clearly they should give the Victorious skin to an ADC.
{{champion:154}} finally in lcs

Lissandra has an incredible ratios this year ( Pick/ban, win/loss) 
Graves is the best carry taking in all ratios ( Kalista has a higher win/loss ratio, but he has over 3 times her picks)
Rumble has incredible ratios as well
And Vi is my final option as who I think might get the skin, because she has very high win ratios, and has ben picked regularly, even after the small nerfs
I want it to be an ADC this year
it will generally go to a champion played as a jungler or support because they have the most impact on the game. If i had to guess id say Hecarim, Leona, Blitzcrank or Sejuani ATM
sejuani plz

Nidalee, Sion, Maokai, Sejuani, or Graves.


Victorious is a champ that had a lot of play time in the Ranked scene. While I'd personally love to see Victorious Jinx, I think we all have to admit that Nidalee and Sion are utter nightmares to fight a lot of the time. Graves has been the defacto ADC for a bit now, but Sivir could take the spot as well if it's going to an ADC. Maokai is still a good pick, and Sejuani (or even WW!) could fill the slot as Junglers. Hecarim could qualify too.

Championship is more for what's played around the world in the LCS/Pro Scene. Riven, Thresh, and last season Shyvana all deserved their spots. If things stay the way they are Sion, Nidalee, Sejuani, and Zed (bleh) are all likely picks. I'm hoping for something more esoteric though....

Championship Urgot anyone? With big V scars on his front and back? RITO PLEASE. I don't even play or like Urgot, but someone needs to love him.
{{champion:111}}
I imagine Sejuani, Nidalee, LeBlanc, Sivir or Graves.
Lissandra probably.
If Nidalee stays easy and broken, it's going to be given to her. Victorious skins are given to the most influential champion of the season.

{{champion:83}} is my serious response
{{champion:44}} is my joke response

Yorick is long overdue for something, anything, and hopefully this would be accompanied with his update
Taric is long overdue for a facelift, and if his {{item:1027}} could get even the tiniest bit shinier, that would be truely, truely, TRUELY outragious
Victorious Urgot or I /uninstall

I have 3 guesses. Victorious Zed, Victorious Sion, Victorious Rek'sai.

Out of all the old bruiser junglers that are getting picked in the tank jungle meta, Rek'sai is one of the only ones.

Zed has been a dominating pick in the midlane for a long time, and many of this seasons mid laners have picked him up. He's got one of the highest pick/ban rates in the LCS at the moment.

Sion came out of nowhere from his rework and has been a common staple in the top lane area. His ability to take a small camp without repurcussion and then thrive in certain 2v1 lanes means that he's been a strong steady pick ever since his rework. Victorious Sion is the one I'd bet is the most likely.

(Victorious Lissandra would have been a choice up until her last set of nerfs made her almost non-existant in the LCS)
I think it would be easier to predict after the summer splits. Just a few weeks ago, Sej was a horrible pick.
